title: Run FO-05 E2E test until passing
description:
Run the FO-05 E2E test to validate the full Mastra upgrade works.

**Spec:** `docs/projects/2026-01-26-mastra-1-0-upgrade/2026-01-26-mastra-1-0-upgrade-spec.md`

**Test file:** `e2e/fo-05.test.ts`

**Prerequisites:**
- Dev server running on localhost:3000
- KV store seeded with `npm run db:seed`

**Command:**
```bash
node --import tsx e2e/fo-05.test.ts
```

**Test covers:**
- FO-05 full onboarding flow
- Dynamic AI-generated screens
- Affirmation generation and swiping
- Summary generation
- All agent calls work correctly

**If test fails:**
1. Check the error message
2. Look for Mastra API compatibility issues
3. Fix and re-run until passing

⚠️ Do not close until E2E test passes completely.
acceptance_criteria: node --import tsx e2e/fo-05.test.ts completes with TEST PASSED message
closed_reason: E2E test passed: Fixed test to handle FO-05 StepReady screen with Create My Affirmations button
